Package chess15.engine

Class Engine

java.lang.Object
chess15.engine.Engine
All Implemented Interfaces:
EngineInterface
public class Engine extends Object implements EngineInterface
Chess Engine class that handles the game logic

    • evalMove

      private boolean evalMove(Vector2 pos, boolean isAttack, boolean onlyAttack, boolean forceAttack)
      Evaluate a move
      Parameters:
      pos - The Vector2 to evaluate
      isAttack - Allow captures
      onlyAttack - Only allow captures
      forceAttack - Allow only moves that could be captures
      Returns:
      Whether the move is valid

    • repeatMove

      private ArrayList<Vector2> repeatMove(Vector2 pos, Vector2 direction, boolean allowAttack, boolean forceAttack)
      Repeat a move in a direction for sliding pieces
      Parameters:
      pos - The Vector2 position to start from
      direction - The Vector2 direction to move in
      allowAttack - Allow captures
      forceAttack - Allow only moves that could be captures
      Returns:
      The ArrayList of Vector2 moves

    • orient

      private ArrayList<Vector2> orient(ArrayList<Vector2> rawDirections, boolean whiteDifferent, Piece.Color color)
      Orient the move based on whether the piece is white or black
      Parameters:
      rawDirections - The ArrayList of Vector2 directions to orient
      whiteDifferent - Whether the moveset is different when the piece is white
      color - The Piece.Color of the Piece
      Returns:
      The ArrayList of Vector2 moves with the correct direction

    • filterDirection

      private boolean filterDirection(Vector2 direction, Vector2 pinDirection, boolean onlyAttacks)
      Filter a direction based on a pin
      Parameters:
      direction - The Vector2 direction to filter
      pinDirection - The Vector2 pin direction
      onlyAttacks - Whether to only allow attacks (pinned pieces can still give check)
      Returns:
      Whether the direction is valid

    • filterDirections

      private ArrayList<Vector2> filterDirections(ArrayList<Vector2> directions, Vector2 pinDirection, boolean onlyAttacks)
      Filter moves based on a pin
      Parameters:
      directions - The ArrayList of Vector2 directions to filter
      pinDirection - The Vector2 pin direction
      onlyAttacks - Whether to only allow attacks (pinned pieces can still give check)
      Returns:
      The ArrayList of filtered Vector2 directions
